alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 2:32AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Potato Creek at County Line Rd near Orchard Hill affecting Spalding and Lamar Counties. For the Flint River Basin...including Lovejoy, Peachtree City, Fayetteville, Americus, Peachtree City, Woolsey, Sharpsburg, Peachtree City, Peachtree City, Senioa, Griffin, Griffin, Orchard Hill, Molena, Thomaston, Carsonville, Montezuma, Byromville... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is expected. * WHERE...Potato Creek at County Line Rd near Orchard Hill. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding of woodlands...fields and pastures begin upstream and downstream from the gage on County Line Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM EDT Monday the stage was 10.6 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
